attributes.action: Stop Benefits and Council Housing entitlements to immigrants untill resident in the UK for 5 years
attributes.additional_details:
Stop giving benefits  and Council Housing to immigrants until they have earned money and proved that their intentions to be in the UK isnt the Benefit system and the free housing.
By doing this there will be more housing for British citizens already occupying the UK and cut the Department for Work and Pensions benefit bill.
